
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.math.BigInteger;
import java.util.StringTokenizer;
public class Main{
 public static void main(String args[]) throws IOException {
        BufferedReader br=new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
        int t=Integer.parseInt(br.readLine());
        while(t-->0)
        {
            StringTokenizer st=new StringTokenizer(br.readLine());
            BigInteger n=BigInteger.valueOf(Long.parseLong(st.nextToken()));
            BigInteger r=BigInteger.valueOf(Long.parseLong(st.nextToken()));
            if(n.equals(r))
                System.out.println(fact(n).mod(BigInteger.valueOf(1000000007)));
            else
                
            System.out.println((fact(n).divide(fact(n.subtract(r)))).mod(BigInteger.valueOf(1000000007)));
        }
    }
 public static BigInteger fact(BigInteger a)
    {
    if(a.equals(BigInteger.ONE))
        return a;
    else
        return (a.multiply(fact(a.subtract(BigInteger.ONE))));
    
    
    }
}
